parameters.name: cluster_id
parameters.description: The ID of the cluster. If you specify a cluster ID, only components used in the cluster are queried. Other parameters are ignored.

parameters.name: cluster_spec
parameters.description: The specifications of the cluster. If cluster_id is specified, this parameter is ignored. You must specify the region_id, cluster_type, profile, cluster_spec, and cluster_version parameters at the same time.

parameters.name: cluster_type
parameters.description: The type of the cluster. If cluster_id is specified, this parameter is ignored. You must specify the region_id, cluster_type, profile, cluster_spec, and cluster_version parameters at the same time.

parameters.name: cluster_version
parameters.description: The version of the cluster. If cluster_id is specified, this parameter is ignored. You must specify the region_id, cluster_type, profile, cluster_spec, and cluster_version parameters at the same time.

parameters.name: profile
parameters.description: The subtype of the cluster. If cluster_id is specified, this parameter is ignored. You must specify the region_id, cluster_type, profile, cluster_spec, and cluster_version parameters at the same time.

parameters.name: region_id
parameters.description: The region ID. If cluster_id is specified, this parameter is ignored. You must specify the region_id, cluster_type, profile, cluster_spec, and cluster_version parameters at the same time.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version of the component. If you do not specify this parameter, the latest version of the component is queried.
